title: Right Under My Nose
itunes:title: Right Under My Nose
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley,  I'm a 44 year old man and my wife and I are legally separated and I am facing legal charges because of her.  We were married for three years and we have a new born son that I am not sure is my son but he definitely could have my blood line.  My brother could be the father of my son.  A year after we got married he came home from the military and he stayed between my house and my mother's house................

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Dear Steve and Shirley,  I'm a 44 year old man and my wife and I are legally separated and I am facing legal charges because of her.  We were married for three years and we have a new born son that I am not sure is my son but he definitely could have my blood line.  My brother could be the father of my son.  A year after we got married he came home from the military and he stayed between my house and my mother's house................
